results.overview: Twenty years after modern civilization has been destroyed, Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone.
results.name: The Last of Us

results.overview: The prequel series finds the Targaryen dynasty at the absolute apex of its power, with more than 15 dragons under their yoke.
results.name: House of the Dragon
